title: Sale of Emera Maine Approved by the MPUC
description: HALIFAX, Nova Scotia--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Emera Inc. (“Emera”) (TSX:EMA) today announced that the Commissioners of the Maine Public Utilities Commission (“MPUC”) have voted unanimously to approve Emera’s proposed sale of Emera Maine (the “Transaction”) to ENMAX …
